p: Turmeric has been reported to respond well to NPK 15-15-15 fertilizer [ 9] and poultry manure (PM) [ 10]. For example, an experiment with four turmeric varieties with organic and inorganic fertilizers [ 11] reported higher yields at 4884 kgha −1 from farmyard manure (organic) compared with 4623 kgha −1 recorded with NPK fertilizer (inorganic) manure. Rhizome yield of turmeric was also reported to increase with increasing concentration of MgSO 4 applied as foliar a spray [ 12]. Crops react in different ways to different chemical or organic fertilizers. Therefore appropriate fertilizer combinations could influence soil chemical properties, crop yield, and quality.
